title: The Price for Apple Music, Apple TV+, Apple One Is Going Up; Apple is increasing subscriptions prices by $1-$2 a month starting Monday
text:
Apple One, which bundles Apple Music, Apple TV+ and other services, will now cost $2 more a month at $16.95. Annual and family plans, which allow account sharing, will also increase in price.

The iPhone maker said Apple Music's price increase is due to the rising cost of licensing music. It said the new price for Apple TV+ reflects the bigger selection of shows and movies it currently has compared with when it launched three years ago.

Write to Joseph Pisani at joseph.pisani@wsj.com
